duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and integrate telecom OSS solutions for Telecom CRM, Order Management, Orchestration, and Network Provisioning.
Understand and apply TM Forum industry standards (eTOM, TAM & SID models) in OSS/BSS system architecture and design.
Analyze business and development specifications to develop requirement gathering, conduct feasibility studies, and develop documentation.
Utilize expertise in analyzing Business and Development Specifications, Use Cases, and Detail Design for business process analysis and conducting sessions.
Examine full-lifecycle wireline system experience with integrations to legacy wireline systems.
Understand end-to-end network architecture in heterogeneous access networks (Wi-Fi, Voice, Internet, and Video).
Work in a high-pressure, fast-paced environment, and multi-task efficiently.
Apply knowledge of software development and delivery, cloud computing, containerization, high-availability, and integration of Cable activation components.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in IT, Telecom, or related field (Master’s preferred)
